title: Missing Woman Found Alive After 24 Years
summary: Barbara Byrd learns her cousin Michele, missing since 2001, is alive but desires privacy, bringing closure after decades.
charlotte_impact: Offers resolution to a long-standing missing person case, highlighting the enduring hope for families of missing individuals.

title: Ballantyne Office Space May Become Housing
summary: Office spaces in Charlotte's Ballantyne area are being considered for conversion into multifamily and townhouse units.
charlotte_impact: Addresses housing needs in a growing area, reflecting urban development trends and adaptation to changing demands.

title: Gastonia Police Raise Funds for Special Olympics
summary: Gastonia Police and SWAT raised $4,705 for Special Olympics, winning first place in fundraising efforts through a polar plunge.
charlotte_impact: Showcases community engagement and support for Special Olympics, fostering positive relationships between police and citizens.

title: Duke Energy Customers Won't Get Refund for Illegal Charges
summary: The NC Court of Appeals ruled Duke Energy customers will not receive refunds for improperly collected charges.
charlotte_impact: Highlights legal battles over consumer rights and utility practices, impacting customer trust and financial burdens.

title: Teens Charged in Fatal Rock Hill Shooting
summary: Two juveniles are charged after an 18-year-old was fatally shot during a failed robbery attempt in a Rock Hill parking deck.
charlotte_impact: Addresses youth violence and crime, raising concerns about safety and the circumstances leading to such incidents.

title: Cloudy Weekend with Spotty Rain
summary: The weekend forecast includes passing showers on Saturday morning and spotty rain on Sunday, with cooler temperatures and gusty winds.
charlotte_impact: Provides weather information relevant to weekend plans, affecting outdoor activities and community events.

title: Woman Arrested for $7.7K Lululemon Theft
summary: A Charlotte woman with a criminal history faces felony charges after a Lululemon theft, requiring significant police resources.
charlotte_impact: Illustrates retail crime and its impact on businesses, highlighting the need for security measures and law enforcement efforts.

title: Stabbing in West Charlotte Injures One
summary: A stabbing on Reid Avenue in west Charlotte resulted in non-life-threatening injuries on Saturday morning.
charlotte_impact: Reflects violent crime incidents in the area, raising concerns about public safety and community well-being.

title: Sex Offender Charged with Grooming Child on Discord
summary: A registered sex offender from Oregon is charged with grooming a Chesterfield County child online using Roblox gift cards.
charlotte_impact: Highlights the dangers of online child exploitation and the importance of parental vigilance and law enforcement intervention.

title: Two Separate Shootings in Salisbury
summary: Police responded to two separate shootings in Salisbury, both resulting in serious injuries to the victims.
charlotte_impact: Indicates a spike in violent crime, raising concerns about public safety and the need for community intervention.

title: I-77S Toll Lane Project Controversy
summary: The proposed I-77 toll lane expansion raises tensions over its impact on west Charlotte's historically Black neighborhoods.
charlotte_impact: Addresses infrastructure development and its potential impact on marginalized communities, sparking debate and community action.

title: Asha Degree's Parents Seek Answers After 26 Years
summary: Asha Degree's parents continue to plead for answers 26 years after her disappearance, vowing to persist until the mystery is solved.
charlotte_impact: Emphasizes the enduring hope and determination of families of missing persons, highlighting the need for continued investigation.

title: Landslide Mapping Stalled Before Fatal Slides
summary: North Carolina's landslide mapping program was stalled years before the Helene slides, leaving many without critical safety information.
charlotte_impact: Reveals the consequences of delayed environmental safety measures, emphasizing the importance of proactive disaster preparedness.

title: Man Charged with Murder in Food Lion Shooting
summary: A man is charged with murder following a fatal shooting at an east Charlotte Food Lion, endangering bystanders.
charlotte_impact: Highlights the risks of gun violence in public spaces, raising concerns about safety and the need for conflict resolution.

title: Climate Change Impacts Coffee Production
summary: Warming temperatures in coffee-growing regions are impacting coffee prices and the ability to grow it.
charlotte_impact: Illustrates the global impact of climate change on agriculture and consumer goods, affecting supply chains and economies.
